name: Angry Pucks
description:
Do you have what it takes to be the best? The highest achiever? The most skilled and resilient player among all the players in the world? THEN PROVE IT!

Angry Pucks is a fast, fun and adrenaline filled ice hockey game, where you CRUSH YOUR FRIENDS DREAMS by beating their top score to a pulp. BE THE BEST, BEAT THE REST! Is your name at the top of the worldwide leaderboard as the best pucker of them all? MAKE IT! WIN!

OR PUCK OFF!

Game Features:
+ Fast paced gameplay and replayability
+ Individual highscore achivements
+ Worldwide leaderboard
+ The angriest pucks of all time
